main.primary_sponsor: The First Hospital Affiliated to Army Medical University (Southwest Hospital)
main.public_title: Autologous bone marrow derived mesenchymal stem cell therapy for endometrial regeneration in infertilie patients of thin endometrium
main.scientific_title: Autologous bone marrow derived mesenchymal stem cell therapy for endometrial regeneration in infertilie patients of thin endometrium
main.i_freetext: BMSCs treatment group:autologous bone marrow derived mesenchymal stem cell intrauterine therapy;control group:transcervical resectionof adhesions;

contact.affiliation: The First Hospital Affiliated to Army Medical University (Southwest Hospital)

criteria.inclusion_criteria: Aged between 20-40 years; infertile women of intrauterine adhesions; thin endometrium with the thickness no more than 7mm
criteria.exclusion_criteria: Acute pelvic infection; pelvic tuberculosis and/or endometrium tuberculosis; dysfunction of blood coagulation; presence of systemic disease contraindicating pregnancy.

secondary_outcome.sec_outcome: biochemical pregnancy rate;clinical pregnancy rate;live birth rate;

ethics_review.contact_address: 30 Gaotanyan Main Road, Shapingba District, Chongqing, China
